hero.caption: Legal Assistance
hero.title: Effortlessly Understand
hero.description: We designed AVOTA AI Legal to be intuitive, easy to use, and surprisingly powerful, helping you navigate contracts and laws without hefty lawyer fees.

feature.legal_jargon_simplified: With AVOTA, complex legal jargon is simplified. Automation and smart analysis elevate your understanding, making legal processes as easy as a breeze.
feature.data_security_priority: Your data security is our top priority. With advanced encryption and robust privacy controls, AVOTA ensures your information is as secure as a vault.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: We're here to help! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us.
faq.setup_avota: How easy is it to set up AVOTA?
faq.setup_avota_answer: Setting up AVOTA is straightforward and user-friendly, designed to get you started quickly with minimal hassle.
faq.integrate_with_platforms: Can I integrate AVOTA with other platforms?
faq.integrate_with_platforms_answer: Yes, AVOTA can be integrated with various platforms seamlessly to enhance your workflow.
faq.update_legal_content: How often do you update your legal content?
faq.update_legal_content_answer: We regularly update our legal content to ensure you have the latest information and features.
faq.refund_policy_answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you are not satisfied with our service.
faq.corporate_plans_answer: Yes, we offer tailored plans for corporate clients.
faq.out_of_storage: What happens when I’m out of storage?
faq.out_of_storage_answer: You will receive a notification, and you can upgrade your plan or delete unused files.
faq.upgrade_plan_answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time through your account settings.
faq.invite_team: How do I invite my team?
faq.invite_team_answer: You can invite your team members through the user management section in your account.
faq.offer_training: Do you offer training for individuals and teams?
faq.offer_training_answer: Yes, we provide training sessions for both individuals and teams.
faq.locked_out: I’m locked out of my account, what do I do?
faq.locked_out_answer: You can reset your password using the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.

testimonial.jessica_comment: AVOTA's legal insights are invaluable! It's like having a legal expert on my team.
testimonial.mark_comment: I was skeptical at first, but now I can't imagine managing contracts without AVOTA. It's a game-changer.
testimonial.melanie_comment: Adopting AVOTA was a breeze. It's made understanding legal documents so much simpler.
testimonial.jim_comment: AVOTA has transformed how we handle legal matters. It's efficient and reliable.

text.description: Book a demo with our team to learn more about AVOTA and how it can assist your business.
